IRS990.ActivityOrMissionDesc: THE ALBANY SYMPHONY ORCHESTRA CELEBRATES OUR GREAT MUSICAL HERITAGE. THROUGH BRILLIANT LIVE PERFORMANCES, INNOVATIVE EDUCATIONAL PROGRAMMING, AND ENGAGING CULTURAL EVENTS, THE ASO ENRICHES A BROAD AND DIVERSE REGIONAL COMMUNITY. IN ADDITION, BY CREATING, RECORDING, AND DISSEMINATING THE MUSIC OF OUR TIME, THE ASO IS ESTABLISHING AN ENDURING ARTISTIC LEGACY THAT IS RESHAPING THE NATION'S MUSICAL FUTURE.
IRS990.MissionDesc: THE ALBANY SYMPHONY ORCHESTRA CELEBRATES OUR GREAT MUSICAL HERITAGE. THROUGH BRILLIANT LIVE PERFORMANCES, INNOVATIVE EDUCATIONAL PROGRAMMING, AND ENGAGING CULTURAL EVENTS, THE ASO ENRICHES A BROAD AND DIVERSE REGIONAL COMMUNITY. IN ADDITION, BY CREATING, RECORDING, AND DISSEMINATING THE MUSIC OF OUR TIME, THE ASO IS ESTABLISHING AN ENDURING ARTISTIC LEGACY THAT IS RESHAPING THE NATION'S MUSICAL FUTURE.
IRS990.Desc: THE ORGANIZATION PERFORMS CONCERTS, SUPPORTS THE CREATION OF NEW MUSIC AND THE DEVELOPMENT OF ARTISTS, PRODUCES RECORDINGS AND VARIOUS EDUCATIONAL PROGRAMS TO PROMOTE CULTURAL ADVANCEMENT.

SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE ORGANIZATION HAS ADOPTED FASB ASC 740-10-25, ACCOUNTING FOR UNCERTAINTY IN INCOME TAXES. THE ORGANIZATION FILES FORM 990 (RETURN OF ORGANIZATION EXEMPT FROM INCOME TAX) ANNUALLY. FORM 990 IS FILED SUBJECT TO EXAMINATION BY THE INTERNAL REVENUE SERVICE UP TO THREE (3) YEARS FROM THE EXTENDED DUE DATE OF EACH RETURN. THE ADOPTION OF THIS STANDARD RESULTED IN NO UNCERTAIN TAX BENEFITS OR PROVISIONS IDENTIFIED AND RECORDED AS A LIABILITY OR ASSET. THE ORGANIZATION BELIEVES THAT THERE ARE NO TAX POSITIONS TAKEN OR EXPECTED TO BE TAKEN THAT WOULD SIGNIFICANTLY INCREASE OR DECREASE UNRECOGNIZED TAX BENEFITS WITHIN 12 MONTHS OF THE REPORTING DATE.

THE ALBANY SYMPHONY ORCHESTRA CELEBRATES OUR GREAT MUSICAL HERITAGE. THROUGH BRILLIANT LIVE PERFORMANCES, INNOVATIVE EDUCATIONAL PROGRAMMING, AND ENGAGING CULTURAL EVENTS, THE ASO ENRICHES A BROAD AND DIVERSE REGIONAL COMMUNITY. IN ADDITION, BY CREATING, RECORDING, AND DISSEMINATING THE MUSIC OF OUR TIME, THE ASO IS ESTABLISHING AN ENDURING ARTISTIC LEGACY THAT IS RESHAPING THE NATION'S MUSICAL FUTURE.
A COPY OF FORM 990 WAS EMAILED TO EACH BOARD MEMBER FOR THEIR REVIEW AND COMMENTS BEFORE IT WAS FILED WITH THE INTERNAL REVENUE SERVICE.

MONITORING AND COMPLIANCE IS ACHIEVED BY FIRST HAVING ALL CONTRACTS APPROVED BY THE EXECUTIVE DIRECTOR BEFORE EXECUTION. A FOLLOW-UP IS DONE ANNUALLY WITH A QUESTIONNAIRE THAT EACH BOARD MEMBER MUST COMPLETE. IT IS DESIGNED TO ELICIT ANY INFORMATION ON ANY RELEVANT BUSINESS DEALINGS AND ALSO DIRECTLY ASKS THE BOARD MEMBER TO AFFIRM COMPLIANCE WITH THE CONFLICT OF INTEREST POLICY.
THE EXECUTIVE DIRECTOR'S SALARY IS APPROVED BY THE FINANCE AND EXECUTIVE COMMITTEES. THE SALARY IS BASED ON COMPARABLES FROM SEARCH FIRM DATA AND THE ORGANIZATIONS OWN RESEARCH.
THE ORGANIZATION MAKES ITS GOVERNING DOCUMENTS AND FINANCIAL STATEMENTS AVAILABLE UPON REQUEST.
